page.title: 10Yarlet Hall School
page.content: wife, makes most of the clothes:the art master makes the scenery and production is by the senior masters.Recent productions have included HMS Pinafore,Oliver,My Fair Lady and the pirates of Penzance.Four performances are given to a total of over 1000 people. Also on Tuesdays in the winter terms there are various hobbies,such as carpentry,chess and modelmaking.At the end of the Christmas term,there is a big party for all the school which includes a big meal and various games.There is also a concert given by the various musicians in the school. Most of the boys come from within a radius of about 20 miles.They have a few days off ot half-term and also two Sundays out.Many parents come to matches.Fees are about Â£900 a term.
